name: Canvas Component Update

movements.name: Update

beats.title: Update Attribute
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want updateAttribute to execute reliably with latency < 100ms so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).
beats.testCase: notifyUi (selection) routes to control panel selection.show via conductor.play

then: component serializes deterministically; payload validates; latency ≤ 20ms

beats.title: Refresh Control Panel
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want refreshControlPanel to execute reliably with latency < 1 second so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).

then: control panel reflects new state within ≤ 50ms

movements.userStory: As a reliability engineer, I need the update symphony to modify component state and attributes with clear telemetry and rollback semantics, meeting SLAs (resolve ≤1s, mutate ≤1s, notify ≤20ms) so UI remains consistent.
movements.businessValue: Enables real-time content updates; reduces user-visible latency; improves perceived responsiveness by 30%
